lead_paragraph: THE PROVISIONAL BISHOP.--The Episcopal Convention of this Diocese, after several ballots, yesterday succeeded in electing a Provisional Bishop. The choice of the Convention was Rev. WILLIAM CREIGHTON of Westchester. In the selection of a person to perform the duties of Bishop, the Convention has been particularly fortunate.
